attributes.action: Bring forward within the course of the next Parliament such legislation as may be necessary to enable the creation of an elected English Assembly which shall have the power to create amend repeal or otherwise modify such legislation as it may at it’s sole discretion deem to necessary from time to time on any matters including but not limited to
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
agriculture, 
forestry and fishing 
education and training 
environment 
health 
housing law 
home affairs 
local government 
natural and built heritage planning 
police and fire services 
social work 
sport and the arts 
statistics and public records 
tourism and economic development 
transport 

The election of the said English Assembly shall be restricted to Parliamentary Constituencies within the borders of England.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
